posts.post_content:
Well, After several months my BST request for a T3b Cobb paid off. It was offered early on but I only recently acquired it. 

 So, now I need a T5 HOF'er. I prefer one that is unaltered with a dark photo. Slabbed or unslabbed. If unslabbed it needs to be numerically gradable.  A corner crease or writing on the back is fine (and preferred). Please help a starving collector out.

[quote name="Leon" post=1202655]Well, After several months my BST request for a T3b Cobb paid off. It was offered early on but I only recently acquired it. 

 So, now I need a T5 HOF'er. I prefer one that is unaltered with a dark photo. Slabbed or unslabbed. If unslabbed it needs to be numerically gradable.  A corner crease or writing on the back is fine (and preferred). Please help a starving collector out.[/QUOTE]

Won't be able to part with any T5s but might be able to offer you a meal.  :p

[quote name="HRBAKER" post=1202657]Won't be able to part with any T5s but might be able to offer you a meal.  :p[/QUOTE]

LOL. That is mighty kind of you, Jeff. I think I will find a meal before I find what I am looking for. And you know me, so by the looks of of it, I haven't missed too many meals.
